text: The 2011–12 Spartak Moscow season was the 20th straight season that Spartak played in the Russian Premier League, the highest tier of football in Russia. ==Season events== On 27 March 2011, Moscow Time was changed from UTC+03:00 with DST, to being permanently set at UTC+04:00. ==Squad== Russian Premier League Final Stats 2011/12 {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;
